long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Chat Shortcut is a Chrome extension that streamlines access to AI assistants directly from your browser's address bar. With a simple "@chat" command, you can quickly initiate a chat with leading AI services like OpenAI, Poe, Gemini, and Claude. After entering your query and pressing Enter, you'll be seamlessly redirected to your chosen AI service, ready to continue the conversation.

Key Features:
• Quick Access: Type "@chat" followed by your query in the Chrome address bar
• Multiple AI Services: Choose from OpenAI, Poe, Gemini, or Claude
• Easy Configuration: Simple options page to select your preferred AI service
• Seamless Integration: Works within Chrome's existing interface

Why we built this:
We created AI Chat Shortcut to streamline the process of accessing AI assistance. By integrating directly with the browser's address bar, we've eliminated the need to navigate to separate websites or apps, making AI interactions faster and more convenient than ever.

Who it's for:
• Students needing quick research assistance
• Professionals looking for instant information or ideas
• Developers seeking code suggestions or explanations
• Anyone who wants rapid access to AI chat services

What's next:
We're planning to add more AI services, implement custom shortcuts, and develop a history feature for past queries. We're also exploring options for local AI models to enhance privacy and speed.

Pricing:
Currently free and open-source
